offer_details_1:
1.    The offer will be valid only for all Seylan Bank Master and Visa Credit / Debit Cardholders.
2.    In order to enjoy the promotion, the full payment needs to be settled with Seylan Bank Master or Visa Credit /Debit Cards.

11.    The offer cannot be combined with any other existing offers.
